001package io.github.ai4ci.abm.behaviour;
002
003import static io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.StateUtils.complianceFatigue;
004import static io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.StateUtils.decreaseSociabilityStrictly;
005import static io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.StateUtils.graduallyRestoreBehaviour;
006import static io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.StateUtils.toLastBranchPoint;
007
008import io.github.ai4ci.abm.ImmutablePersonState;
009import io.github.ai4ci.abm.PersonState;
010import io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.State;
011import io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.StateMachineContext;
012import io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.StateUtils.DoesPCRIfSymptomatic;
013import io.github.ai4ci.util.Sampler;
014
015/**
016 * A behaviour model that works with
017 * {@link io.github.ai4ci.abm.policy.ReactiveLockdown}, implementing policy
018 * changes by allowing people to enter a low activity state.
019 */
020public enum LockdownIsolation implements BehaviourModel, DoesPCRIfSymptomatic {
021
022        /**
023         * Everyone enters minimal mobility state immediately in instruction to lock
024         * down (@see {@link WAIT}). This is triggered by
025         * {@link io.github.ai4ci.abm.policy.ReactiveLockdown#MONITOR}. This is
026         * centrally enforced and results in the person branching from their previous
027         * behaviour pausing that.
028         */
029        ISOLATE {
030                @Override
031                public State.BehaviourState nextState(
032                                ImmutablePersonState.Builder builder, PersonState person,
033                                StateMachineContext context, Sampler rng
034                ) {
035                        decreaseSociabilityStrictly(builder, person);
036                        return WAIT;
037                }
038        },
039
040        /**
041         * In the locked down waiting state people's compliance levels will decrease
042         * linearly. If the person's compliance level falls too low the person will
043         * randomly become non-compliant to lockdown. <!-- (@see
044         * {@link NonCompliant#DEFAULT}). --> In the case of becoming non compliant
045         * to lockdown the person will return to whatever they were doing before
046         * lockdown (but with reduced compliance)
047         */
048        WAIT {
049                @Override
050                public State.BehaviourState nextState(
051                                ImmutablePersonState.Builder builder, PersonState person,
052                                StateMachineContext context, Sampler rng
053                ) {
054                        if (!person.isCompliant())
055                                // return branchTo(person, NonCompliant.DEFAULT);
056                                return toLastBranchPoint(context);
057                        else {
058                                complianceFatigue(builder, person);
059                                return WAIT;
060                        }
061                }
062        },
063
064        /**
065         * After the lockdown is released, triggered by
066         * {@link io.github.ai4ci.abm.policy.ReactiveLockdown#LOCKDOWN}, people
067         * return to a mobility state larger than their baseline, gradually return to
068         * their default mobility over the next 10 days, and return to whatever state
069         * they were in before the lockdown was triggered.
070         */
071        RELEASE {
072                @Override
073                public State.BehaviourState nextState(
074                                ImmutablePersonState.Builder builder, PersonState person,
075                                StateMachineContext context, Sampler rng
076                ) {
077                        builder.setMobilityModifier(1.25);
078                        return graduallyRestoreBehaviour(10, toLastBranchPoint(context));
079                }
080        },
081
082//      /**
083//       * Between lockdowns peoples compliance levels will slowly return to normal
084//       * unless they are symptomatic.
085//       */
086//      RELAX {
087//              public BehaviourState nextState(ImmutablePersonState.Builder builder,
088//                              PersonState person, StateMachineContext context, Sampler rng) {
089//                      if (person.isSymptomatic()) return toLastBranchPoint(context);
090//                      complianceRestoreSlowly(builder,person);
091//                      return RELAX;
092//              }
093//      }
094
095        ;
096
097}
